Index » NavigationUI

Class: NavigationUI

Defined in: coffee/NavigationUI.coffee

Overview

Thin, generic wrapper for an interactive canvas / 3D element.

Examples:

customize in a subclass 

class ThreeDNavUI extends NavigationUI
  mouseWheel: (evt) ->
    super evt
    this.zoomOnWheel(evt)

Direct Known Subclasses

NavigableScene

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) mouseDown(evt) Bound mousedown event callback.
  • # (void) mouseWheel(evt) wheel event callback.
  • # (void) mouseUp(evt) Bound mouseup event callback.
  • # (void) touchStart(evt) Bound touchstart event callback.
  • # (void) touchEnd(evt) Bound touchend event callback.
  • # (Object) getTouchXY(evt) Bound Gets the local (element-frame) coordinates of the first targetTouch of a TouchEvent.
  • # (Object) getMouseXY(evt) Bound Gets the local (element-frame) coordinates of a mouse event

Constructor Details

# (void) constructor(element)

Constructor

Registers callbacks on mousedown, mouseup, mousemove, wheel, touchstart, touchmove, and touchend. Sets listeners for mouseup and touchend on the window object because control gestures may end outside the bounds of the element.

Parameters:

  • element ( DOMNode ) — the element to listen on / use to calculate positions.

Instance Method Details

# (void) mouseDown(evt) Bound

mousedown event callback. Sets this.interacting to true and sets this.startPoint to the local (element-frame) x and y coordinates.

Parameters:

  • evt ( Event )

# (void) mouseWheel(evt)

wheel event callback. Logs evt.deltaX, evt.deltaY, evt.deltaZ, otherwise no-op.

Parameters:

  • evt ( Event )

# (void) mouseUp(evt) Bound

mouseup event callback. Sets this.interacting to false

Parameters:

  • evt ( Event )

# (void) touchStart(evt) Bound

touchstart event callback. Sets this.interacting to true and sets this.startPoint to the local (element-frame) x and y coordinates.

Parameters:

  • evt ( Event )

# (void) touchEnd(evt) Bound

touchend event callback. Sets this.interacting to false

Parameters:

  • evt ( Event )

# (Object) getTouchXY(evt) Bound

Gets the local (element-frame) coordinates of the first targetTouch of a TouchEvent.

Parameters:

  • evt ( TouchEvent )

Returns:

  • ( Object ) — {x: Number, y: Number} coordinates within the element

# (Object) getMouseXY(evt) Bound

Gets the local (element-frame) coordinates of a mouse event

Parameters:

  • evt ( Event )

Returns:

  • ( Object ) — {x: Number, y: Number} coordinates within the element
